## OWebForm.getFormData() method

Returns a FormData containing the validated form fields.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFormData(fields?: string[]): FormData;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fields | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The fields name list. When empty all field will be added to the FormData. |

<b>Returns:</b>

FormData
